name: CVE-2022-33887
description: A maliciously crafted PDF file when parsed through Autodesk AutoCAD 2023 causes an unhandled exception. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash or read sensitive data or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_advance_steel:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_advance_steel:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_architecture:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_architecture:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_civil_3d:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_civil_3d:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_electrical:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_electrical:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_lt:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_lt:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_map_3d:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_map_3d:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_mechanical:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_mechanical:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_mep:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_mep:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_plant_3d:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:autodesk:autocad_plant_3d:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
